ALL entertainment industries that are big have mostly repetition, formulas. It comes from being big, because it works. Formulas work. There is also a place for variation, so just focus on praising that instead and it will be faster for everyone.

Complaining about repetition in a big business is useless.

First it starts small and you see tons of variation to see what sells.
The it grows and attracts businesses, which focus mainly on those formulas that were found to sell in the previous phase.
Then there is a relatively small pushback from originality to please a part of the market.

It stays like that unless there is a big change in the audience. This is all entertainment for profit. Porn is not different. In fact porn is so big that is always a leader in change. So if the market is old, what you see it's what you are going to get. It's already developed.

2 - Y'all cry and complain about netorare when the dude is losing someone. But IF a girl is stealing a guy from somebody else, suddenly you all are like "Wow, this reverse netorare is great, I love this reverse netorare, we need more like this".
